quotes.quote: Pilates is the only exercise program that has changed my body and made me feel great.
Pilates is gaining the mastery of your mind over the complete control over your body.
Pilates is definitely my favorite workout because it's hard but at the same time relaxing.
The Pilates Method of Body Conditioning is gaining the mastery of your mind over the complete control of your body.
Through the Pilates Method of Body Conditioning this unique trinity of a balanced body, mind and spirit can ever be attained. Self-confidence follows.
You can say what Pilates is in three words. Stretch with Strength and Control. And the control part is the most important because that makes you use your mind.
Pilates is amazing. It makes you conscious of how you have been doing something incorrectly for so long, even something as simple as just standing there.
Pilates has been the perfect solution to maintaining strength and vitality in my life.
Pilates makes you feel good because you're doing something that's good for your body, and you start seeing it. It elongates the muscles.
Ten years of Pilates has really changed my body for the better.
Pilates is my favorite core strengthener. I do it three or four times a week. With all the strengthening and lengthening, it's like ballet. Plus, you get to do it lying down!
Pilates is my favorite meditative way to get in shape. I don't like the gym and I don't like running, so I just lay on my Pilates reformer. It's great.
Pilates is an awesome cross-training exercise for any sport because it focuses on functional movement.
I think Pilates is great, especially when you can do it with a trainer who keeps you on track.
Pilates is amazing, my posture is so much better and I'm even starting to get muscles on my tummy - it's incredible.
I found that doing Pilates consistently three to four times a week had an amazing effect on really toning and shaping a tight waist and legs.
